bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Criteria for Security Systems for Nuclear Power Generating Stations
IEEE Standard Criteria for Security Systems for Nuclear Power Generating Stations

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Superseded by IEEE 692-1997 Criteria are provided for the design of an integrated security system for nuclear power generating stations. Requirements are included for the overall system, interfaces, subsystems, and individual electrical and electronic equipment. This standard addresses equipment for securityrelated detection, surveillance, access control, communication, and data acquisition.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
